3: He moves. Toward the evacuation point.
The sun is rising from the south, casting a slanted ray of bright yellow light. He sees a shimmering dot in the north, like a star, glowing faintly.
All forces, prepare for battle! Fight back these sons of ****es!
He holds the girl up like the Holy Grail.
His receiver is damaged beyond repair, unable to distinguish the girl's cry from the surrounding clamor.
Then he pushes the girl forward.
Ensure the child's safety! Damn it, the ****ing Corrupted are downright evil!
HNB1 files through his memory disk, finding a scene of human heroes dying in battle. He tries to force out a smile.
Though he might look just like a cruel and frightening monster to the people...
But he knows that his mission is complete. After all, he is a Tai'E. He was created to protect humanity.
After that, he never felt anything again.
